title: Queue Data Structure
subject: Data Structures
theory: A Queue follows **FIFO** (First In, First Out). Think of a line at a ticket counter. New people join Back (Enqueue), service happens at Front (Dequeue).

examples.explanation: First element added (1) is first removed.

interview_questions.question: Implement Queue using Stacks?
interview_questions.answer: Yes, using two stacks (Inbox and Outbox). Enqueue O(1), Dequeue amortized O(1).

real_world_use_cases.description: Jobs are printed in the order they arrive.
